title: Abyss Predator AMA!
body:
Hello OPL Fans!

We are back for our second AMA this year!
Feel free to ask us any question you like and we will do our best to answer. 
We will only be answering questions between 6pm - 7pm AEST, but feel free to post your questions early. 

Today we will be joined by:

Jackson **'Pabu'** Pavone - [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Pabu22?lang=en)
Sebastian **'Seb'** De Ceglie - [Twitter](https://twitter.com/SebOCEJG?lang=en)
Carlo **'Looch'** La Civita - [Twitter](https://twitter.com/LoochOCE)
Julian **'Raid'** Skordos - [Twitter](https://twitter.com/sayraid?lang=en)
Andrew **'Rosey'** Rose - [Twitter](https://twitter.com/OCERosey)

Ask away!

replies.body:
Hi all,

Who is the worst Pubg player in your team and why is it Seb?

he has no hands

- Pabu
Raid, how do you keep your hair so luscious
L'oreal, because he's worth it
i dont get it

Hey guys!

Pabu: how have you found doing the fly in - fly out thing while also completing high school this split? What's been the toughest challenge for you?

Everyone else: Tell me about your gaming house experience this year - have you enjoyed it in comparison to playing from your own family homes?
I'll let everyone else answer this :^)
{{champion:63}}
Tips for the weekend?
ye wheres tips

high school is pretty easy it's just meaningless busywork

the toughest challenge for me is getting enough sleep whilst doing all my schoolwork and playing scrims and keeping up with my soloqueue, it's quite rough, I nap a lot

- Pabu

Hi all,
Apologies in advance as this is a question/complaint.
(assuming your fan memberships are run by management, if it's run by the players then it is directed at you guys)
Are the players aware (and do you support) of the lack of respect and communication towards your fans who try to actively support your team?

The context is in regards to your team's membership levels and the promised rewards. After purchasing one of these I'd heard and received nothing for almost 2 months until I chased you guys up. In all honesty it feels borderline scam.

Hi xWEKx,

I took a look into this and checked the tracking number on your order. 
I can see the Membership was sent in two different packages. The first package should have arrived today according to the tracking number. 

The second package has also been shipped!

We apologise for the lack of communication, you should have received an email last night regarding a full refund. You will receive a full refund and get to keep your products as an apology for the delay. 

Please let me know if I can be of further assistance. I have a direct line of contact with the Ownership group and can ensure you are looked after.

Hi Brendan,

Thank you for looking into this for me and your high level of professionalism.
My apologies if I came off as scathing in my post. 

Go Abyss!

Hi. 

Big fan. 

My question is for Raid.  

What would you choose a chocolate cake with sprinkles or win 10 urf games in a row?

Ty.
urf, because you guys ruined my win rate lul
raid can get cakes on his own but he can't get urf wins for the life of him

Hello, hi, good evening, 

this is a question to all of you because you're all cool.

What's your favourite colour?

Purple 

- Pabu
lul
blue
Green
red

Hello raid you flipping demi god, this is your super fan Harrison ;) here, just wanted to run things by you; 1. Do you still eat a tub of ice-cream a day in the gaming house, 2. what did you do from the age of 2-4 to become the mechanical demi god that you're known as, 3. When do we expect Jonah to be trailing behind you and your spot light of stardom, 4. pl0x come back to port royal teamspeak you were and are our most famous visitor and 5. dont let those solo que nooblords wreck your elo, you're of course the perfect player. Also please play urf with me mate
crash bandicoot, jonah might be in opl next year depending on if he improves. i will play game of urf with you later tonight add me <3 x
yasss queen
What team Opl team would win a Russian beer pong gauntlet?

us 'cause Rosey is a machine

- Pabu

Hello Abyss esports, big fan,

Wanted to gather some insight into one of your previous matches. In game 2 of the week 7 match versus Exile 5. The jungler Seb dies to Exile 5's adc "Crayzee". On the 4th bullet of Jhin's Curtain Call Seb (playing Lee Sin) dies whilst having flash still up. Was this a miscommunication? Did you assume someone would block for you? Or am I to believe that this was  just a simple case of greedily holding onto summoner spells? 

Many Thanks,
Daniel "FiveToEight" Hicks

seb's fingers probably slipped

- Pabu
Hey all, this is a question for all of you, what is your favourite animal?

fire ferrets

- Pabu
Hard to choose between meerkats and sharks
Lion
raid

Hey, I wanted to ask a question for the bot lane. How do you guys feel about supports like morgana now taking heal and the adc taking barrier and what do you feel about the Morgana, ardent and stoneborn pact synergy.

I think supports that take windspeakers is really good with the heal. I think morg is in a pretty good spot right now with stoneborn and ardent, I also like running zilean with this, more fun than really good but can be quite good
its quite strong, rosey and i still prefer cc and high pressure bot lanes rather than ardent censor heavy lanes
Raid, in your opinion what are your top adcs for low elo to learn and carry games? What should one focus on as ADC to improve overall and climb?
twitch, trist, xayah, farming and playing overly aggressive in lane

You guys have had some amazing individual plays across all your lanes and some other great team plays, but it seems that sometimes you don't get both of these together in the same game - what is your biggest focus for improvement - the individual laning component or the team play after laning phase ends?
